sentences.english: Two girls enjoy themselves in the sea water.
sentences.chinese: 兩個小女孩忘情的在玩水。

sentences.english: Beating forgets kindnesses together which with you.
We were lost in admiration of the beauty of the scene.
sentences.chinese: 我們忘情地讚美着明媚的風光。

sentences.english: They are not entangled, river water is sweet.
sentences.chinese: 他們再也不會糾纏了，忘川之水在於忘情。

sentences.english: Soup is also called over a drink, then leave this life.
sentences.chinese: 孟婆湯又稱忘情水，一喝便忘前世今生。

sentences.english: Sansheng Stone River, may have lost his water, Bana open, prosperous dream of a tree.
sentences.chinese: 三生石畔，可有忘情之水，彼岸花開，一樹繁華如夢。

sentences.english: Love with your heart and soul, as if you would never be hurt.
sentences.chinese: 你該忘情的愛人，就好像從來不會受傷害一樣。

sentences.english: Please give me a cup of water losing love, never let me cry!
sentences.chinese: 給我一杯忘情水，讓我從此不流淚。

definition: great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
overwhelmed (with joy, sorrow etc)/to feel transported
free of worldly concerns/above the fray/at peace with the world
to have cordial relations with each other/to have sexual intercourse
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
ecstasy/rapture/to feel overwhelming joy or sorrow
